topic: stock futures are little changed ahead of jobs report, potential tariff ruling: live updates

text: Investors are awaiting a crucial jobs report and a potential tariff ruling that could significantly impact the market.
Economists are predicting a moderate increase in employment rates.
The unemployment rate is expected to hold steady at around 4 percent.
A potential tariff ruling could affect trade relationships between countries.
The US and several key countries are involved in the potential tariff ruling.
China is one of the countries that could be affected by the tariff ruling.
The European Union is also a key country in the potential tariff ruling.
Stock futures are little changed ahead of the key announcements.
The Dow Jones and S&P 500 futures are showing minimal gains.
The Nasdaq futures are slightly lower, indicating a cautious approach by investors.
Investors are taking a cautious approach ahead of the key announcements.
The market reaction to the jobs report and tariff ruling is uncertain.
A significant shift in stock prices is possible after the announcements.
The situation will be closely monitored as the day progresses.
